remarks: The (signed) angle between two vectors is in ` ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ` . Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
ang.1 $e |- F = ( x e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) , y e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) |-> ( Im ` ( log ` ( y / x ) ) ) ) $.
angcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
angcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) $.
angcld.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. CC ) $.
angcld.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= 0 ) $.
angcld $p |- ( ph -> ( X F Y ) e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ) $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
